typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as short,
		time as short,
		text as string,
		event_type as short,
		event_type2 as integer,
		side as short,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as integer,
		shot_outcome as integer,
		is_goal as integer,
		location as integer,
		bodypart as integer,
		assist_method as integer,
		situation as integer,
		fast_break as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Events
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		link_odsp as string,
		adv_stats as integer,
		date as date,
		league as string,
		season as short,
		country as string,
		ht as string,
		at as string,
		fthg as short,
		ftag as short,
		odd_h as double,
		odd_d as double,
		odd_a as double,
		odd_over as string,
		odd_under as string,
		odd_bts as string,
		odd_bts_n as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GameInfo
Events derive(player = iifNull(player,'NA'),
		event_team = iifNull(event_team,'NA'),
		opponent = iifNull(opponent,'NA'),
		event_type = iifNull(event_type,99),
		event_type2 = iifNull(event_type2,99),
		shot_place = iifNull(shot_place,99),
		shot_outcome = iifNull(shot_outcome,99),
		location = iifNull(location,99),
		bodypart = iifNull(bodypart,99),
		assist_method = iifNull(assist_method,99),
		situation = iifNull(situation,99)) ~> CleanNULL
CleanNULL, GameInfo join(Events@id_odsp == GameInfo@id_odsp,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinData
JoinData select(mapColumn(
		id_odsp = Events@id_odsp,
		id_event,
		sort_order,
		time,
		text,
		event_type,
		event_type2,
		side,
		event_team,
		opponent,
		player,
		player2,
		player_in,
		player_out,
		shot_place,
		shot_outcome,
		is_goal,
		location,
		bodypart,
		assist_method,
		situation,
		country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as integer,
		time as integer,
		text as string,
		event_type as integer,
		event_type2 as integer,
		side as integer,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as integer,
		shot_outcome as integer,
		is_goal as integer,
		location as integer,
		bodypart as integer,
		assist_method as integer,
		situation as integer,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> gameEvents
